issue.title: Add unit tests for HTTP 503 responses
issue.body:
Add unit tests for HTTP adapter responses with status code 503.
Extend `ApplicationClientFactory` with extra consumer methods to allow setting the delivery state explicitly.
Preparation for #2166.

issue.title: [#2166] Improve 503 error messages in HTTP adapter
issue.body:
Also improve the corresponding documentation for the HTTP adapter and CoAP adapter.

This fixes #2166.

issue.title: CoAP - Event Queue Full - Response Code 4.00 (Bad Request)
issue.body:
When sending event's too fast, the event queue gets full. Then the client receives

> 4.00 - AMQ229102: Address "event/<my_tenant>" is full.

Is that by intention? 
Should it be adapted to 5.03?
